description.lang: MYHOMEBOX is the hub that brings together all your devices, old and new.By connecting new wireless communication protocols such as Z-Wave and older ones like 433 MHz and 868 MHz, you are free to pick any device and brand of your choice.All devices controlled by one app makes a smart home accessible and affordable for anyone.Works with: Z-Wave, Bluetooth, DECT ULE, Wifi, 433 MHz, 868 MHz. - Compatible with hundreds of products- Secure cloud- Local app - Easy to set up- Expandable for future communication developments by USB port
